title: Get four classic window box planters for just £19.99!
content:
If there’s anything the last year has taught us, it’s how precious our outdoor space is – and with the Whitefurze Athens Window Box bundle you can make your garden feel even more special. Before you’ve even added your choice of beautiful blooms, the classic terracotta design of the planters will really make your windowsills and patios stand out. They’re also made from durable, lightweight, injection-moulded polypropylene, so they’ll be as tough as they are decorative! With this exclusive deal, you can get four of these stunning window boxes for just £19.99, plus £2.95 for standard delivery or £4.50 for fast delivery.

Claim offer now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Ready to add these timeless planters to your collection? Here’s what the Whitefurze Window Box bundle includes:

  • 2 x Whitefurze Window Box, 60cm, terracotta
  • 2 x Whitefurze Window Box, 40cm, terracotta
  • Classic ribbed design
  • Injection-moulded polypropylene
  • Lightweight and weather resistant

Offer ends 18/06/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Claim offer now

author: Steve Newell
